__e: I'm the dumb guy, and you're the woman who's supposed to stop the dumb guy from doing dumb shit!
Too busy with that new boyfriend of yours to come down and talk shit with me?
I said stupid things, and I said them for reasons... that have nothing to do with you, I hate myself for doing it... and I know you do, too, and I am sorry.
What fools we are talking to each other this way as though I'd do anything to you or you to me.
Maybe I don't want to do dumb stuff with you all the time, but...
Because I-I honestly can not understand why you would do something so fucking stupid.
Oh, my God. He's gonna do something stupid and ruin it for me.
- Because I didn't want you doing something stupid like this!
I've done stupid things in my life but believe me, I don't know anything.
But if he would've hurt my mother one more time, I would've done something stupid.
You see... see, it's not the first time that we got mad because one of us Did something stupid.
What do you take me for, an even dumber broad than I am?
Well... Darling, it was all so many years ago and I was just a silly girl.
Except if she isn't just a silly girl, that may be exactly how she wants to appear.
I've been here for 20 years, you fucking prick.
Whoever can't, best stay the stupid asshole he always was.
This ain't your business, you stupid cunt.
I didn't want you to think I was a stupid little kid.
I want to pretend... I am a regular dumb kid.
- Now look what you done, you stupid child!
